docs.text: Welcome to JUI A smart&furious toolkit to build and share web apps in pure Java without frontend development experience. JUI includes a simple HTTP/HTTPS/WSS server HTML Components Text Elements Input Elements Container Elements Chart Elements Media Elements Status Elements JUI Components Authenticator Gallery
